checkPackageJson.title: Check A-Frame dependency in package.json
checkPackageJson.description: Checks A-Frame dependency in projects package.json, id present uses that dependency version to generate autocomplet suggestions and documentation URL's

versionWarning.title: Warn if project uses EOL version of A-Frame
versionWarning.description: Show warning if project depends on End-of-life A-Frame version

versionNotify.title: Notify for newer version of A-Frame
versionNotify.description: Show notification when there is newer version of A-Frame available for update.

defaultAframeVersion.title: Default A-Frame version
defaultAframeVersion.description: Set Default A-Frame version used when not watching package.json or project has no dependency in package.json.

attributeDefaults.title: Automatically Set Attribute Default value
attributeDefaults.description: Automatically set value for attribute or get default value from mapped component property.

componentDefaults.title: Automatically Set Component Defaults
componentDefaults.description: Automatically insert all component properties with defaults

notifOnActivationFailure.title: Warn when this atom package is unable to activate
notifOnActivationFailure.description: Show warning when this atom package can not be activate (e.g to old Atom)

devel.title: Development only! Changing these options may break this package.

docsBaseURL.title: Documentation base url
docsBaseURL.description: Documentation base url used to generate links. You can set that also to localhost when working on A-Frame documentation

website.title: A-Frame website
website.description: You can set that also to localhost when working on A-Frame site

github.title: A-Frame Github
github.description: You can set that also to your own fork

npmapi.title: NPM API uri for A-Frame
npmapi.description: NPM API identifier from where atom-aframe fetches versions
